name: Faded Solitude
description:
'Faded Solitude' is an atmospheric adventure game with a gritty pencil-drawn art style!

Story:

A doll, hooked by the shoulders, hanging in a dark cave. This reoccurring dream plagues Lorry, a peculiar girl, who's also the protagonist of our story.

With the help of her motherly guardian, named Helina, Lorry tries to dissect this dream bit by bit.

Little progress is made on the matter, until one day:

A mysterious picture frame suddenly moves and reveals its secrets...

Game Features:

If you’re searching for a game with:

  • Puzzles and exploration
  • Atmospheric environments
  • A heartfelt, quirky, yet intriguing story

Then this game is definitely for you!

You can currently play the first public demo, containing the first act of the story. Feedback and bug-reporting is very much appreciated! :-)

Who’s behind this game?

This team currently consists of two guys living half a world apart from each other: A danish-australian collaboration! Faded Solitude is our passion project.

Artist: Alex D. (@Trailerfilms1) Programmer: Luke Graf (@RocketBoyweee)

Writing, design, sound and music: Both of us.
